name: Hardcore Questing Mode Data File
summary: Learn about .HQM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Minecraft is a popular cross-platform game where you can break and place blocks in order to build structures and explore the virtual world. Because of its popularity, a variety of users have developed mods to alter the gameplay of Minecraft. The Hardcore Questing Mode mod allows you to play in multiplayer hardcore mode in Minecraft but with more than just 1 life, which keeps your world from being deleted and protects you from getting banned from a server when you die.
